the last few years- and it certainly has- much of blame falls on Eric Schmidt . His haughty, creepy, and occasionally insulting way of addressing the company's approach to privacy is notorious. Google policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, he once said, unwittingly showing that Google's policy is just the opposite.
